items.value:
An Apple for Baldi
Give this to Baldi and as long as you have at least {0} YTPs,
he won't resist from stopping to scarf it down!
May take away half of your points if you have too many!

Bus Pass
You'll need not only one of these with you if you want to go
on a field trip, but also {0} spare YTPs for the travelling costs!

Grappling Hook
Fire this baby at a far away wall to quickly get pulled towards it.
Each use charges you {0} YTPs, instead of just when it is entirely used up.
